body.name: VASAGLE Shoe Rack for Entryway, 5 Tier Shoe Storage Shelves, 16-20 Pairs Shoe Organizer, with Sturdy Wooden Top and Steel Frame, Free Standing, Industrial, Rustic Brown and Black ULBS038B01
body.merchantInfo: Sold by SONGMICS HOME US and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 45 mins
features: [Holds More Shoes] This 5 tier shoe rack can hold 16-20 pairs of shoes with the top board; the distance between each of the 4 mesh shelves is 8" to fit heels and high tops on the shelves

[Reliable Support] With a max. load capacity of 59.5 lb on the top surface, you can put bags, frames, books, and decorations on it; with a max. load capacity of 24.2 lb on each shelf, all your shoes can safely land on this rack

[Worry-Free Storage] Each shelf can be placed flat or angled by mounting it to different screw holes on the side frames, so you can store and display your shoes the way you like; the raised edge of the shelf prevents your shoes from getting your wall dirty
[Solid yet Stylish] The mix of particleboard and steel makes for a solid structure, while the mix of rustic brown and black also makes it an industrial shelf that’ll complement any entryway
[What You Get] A 5 tier shoe rack that keeps the shoe mess in your entryway at bay, with clear instructions and labeled parts for an easy, quick assembly process

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than anticipated
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack is slim, sturdy and looks great. Fits exactly where I wanted it to and holds plenty of shoes. I utilize the top wooden shelf as a drop spot in my bedroom. It was relatively easy to assemble and is nicer than I anticipated for the price. It could also be used for things other than shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Brand!
reviews.reviewText: This brand and product has become my go to for shelving/shoe organization! It is sturdy, easy to assemble and looks good no matter what area or use you have for it. I especially like the rustic "wood" top on these. IMO, this product is well made, very transitional and works well in any decor. Note to Vasagle...don't go changing the production of this product and do your best to maintain its affordable pricing. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, quality, and design!
reviews.reviewText: The box the shoe organizer was delivered in was very heavy, giving us hope about the quality and sturdiness that was found to be true. The assembly was simple and didn't take long at all. We love the option for the shelves to be tipped or flat, and we ended up doing the bottom three shelves tipped and one flat for my purse. We wear women's US shoe size 10.5-12 which were too long for the tipped shelves to be used with the lip holding them in unless the structure was moved an inch or two from the wall. We played around with it and decided to place the shoes on the lip still gaining some tilt but keeping the back flush with the wall. The top is great quality wood for the price. It has slight texture to it and not a faux wood look printed onto it. We're quite happy with this purchase and the design allows us to change the layout as our needs change over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Spacious and Sturdy Shoe Shelf with a Functional Twist
reviews.reviewText: I recently added this shoe shelf with a flat top to my home, and overall, I'm quite pleased with its performance, meriting a solid four-star rating. The first thing that stands out is its sturdiness. It feels robust and reliable, easily bearing the weight of multiple pairs of shoes without any sign of strain.Aesthetically, the shelf is a winner. It has a sleek and modern look that fits well in my space, and the flat top adds a touch of practicality, serving as an additional counter space for various uses.However, there's a slight drawback concerning its dimensions, especially for those with larger shoe sizes. I wear a size 10, and I've noticed that the toes of my shoes extend beyond the back of the shelf. This means I can't place the shelf flush against the wall; it needs to be about an inch or two away to accommodate my shoes. While this isn't a deal-breaker, it's a point worth noting for potential buyers with larger feet.A bit more width would make this shelf perfect for my needs. That said, it's still a valuable addition to my home, offering both storage and style. It's a great choice for anyone seeking a shoe storage solution that combines functionality with a modern aesthetic, keeping in mind the slight space adjustment for larger shoe sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It looks even nicer than the pictures and was fast and easy to build. It is sturdy enough for 12 pairs of shoes and boots plus shelf space on the top. It looks nice in the entryway. I would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. Was looking for something to organize shoes right when the kids come in the laundry room. This was super easy to set up and looks great. Also, very sturdy piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We needed a shoe rack for the back door. This fit perfectly in our spot and has a great top for purses and things. It is sturdy and has 2 ways for the shoe racks to go. I will say that if you follow the instructions at first it does not give you the option for the slanted way. It is not till you have it together that the last page shows you how to incline the racks. At that point I was not gonna go back lol. Nice, sturdy, and heavier then expected piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm going to order another one
reviews.reviewText: I like it. Especially the 8 inch space between the shelves. It was pretty easy to put together, fair price, good looking, sturdy. Hopefully the nice looking board on top is water resistance cause I will put shoes on top of it also. I also putting 4X4 wood under the legs so I can use the floor as an extra space for shoes. I'm ordering one more.
Great product, easy to put together!! Looks as described!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and great storage solution
reviews.reviewText: Since the racks are tilted it is easy access to grab shoes on the way out. This really freed up space in our boot room. I like the minimalist design, and it does as advertised - holds our shoes. We have had it for about a month and I am satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: You won't get a better $60 shoe rack.
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical when it arrived due to the small box, but I stand corrected - it's a solid shoe rack that holds 3 shoes comfortably on each shelf and 4 if you want to cram. The height is ideal for keys and the faux wood top is not as awful as you would expect.
Easy to assemble, looks great, well made and affordable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy with this purchase, exactly what we needed.
reviews.reviewText: Got tired of tripping over shoes and boots by the front entrance, this nicely solved the problem. The shelves are far enough apart that slip on boots will fit, my size 14's fit ok as well which is a bonus. It looks nice, is sturdy and wasn't too hard to assemble, it came with all the bits and pieces as well as a couple extras, which is handy should any bolts strip out. Also came with the tools needed to assemble. I like that the shelves can be assembled flat or slanted or a combination of both, I'm thinking of changing the bottom shelf to flat to give easier access for the larger shoes and boots.
